title: Top Places to Visit in Faizabad (Ayodhya), Uttar Pradesh
content: Faizabad is a city in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh, and forms a municipal corporation with Ayodhya. It is the headquarters of Faizabad District and Faizabad division. It is situated on the banks of river Ghaghra (locally known as Saryu) about 130 km east of state capital Lucknow. It was the
